detail_desc: Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted seams and contrasting colour mesh sections at the sides. Round neck with a narrow trim, and short raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in inside-out sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and raw edges.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.

Blouse in woven fabric with decorative gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and gently dropped shoulders.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft cotton-blend knit with hole-knit details, long raglan sleeves with lacing at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flip-flops with glittery straps in thermoplastic polyurethane, a print motif, and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist and a double-layered tulle skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front, a yoke at the top and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline, short sleeves and buttons down the front.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short dress in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
Trainers in a cotton weave with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short, fitted dress in tulle with elasticated seams for a draped effect. Square neckline with a small frill trim at the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and around the hems, and a seam at the hem with a small frill trim. Jersey lining.
Loose-fitting trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with a sequined motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.

Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable fasteners, a yoke with a box pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Slightly shorter jumper in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Skirt in washed denim with front pockets and buttons down the front.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, round neckline, long sleeves and wide elasticated ribbing at the hem. Light support. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Body in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a string back.
Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with cap sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, rib-trimmed neckline and gently dropped shoulders.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Blouse in a soft, patterned weave with short, wide raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof, functional fabric with imitation leather details and an ankle-height shaft with an elastic drawstring at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide top in soft mesh with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Jumper in soft rib knit with a high stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Bra in lace and mesh with crossover straps at the front and underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a collar and shoulder tabs with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Slippers with a satin bow on the front and embossed plastic soles.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length lace trousers with straight, wide legs and a concealed zip in the side. Jersey lining.
Fully lined swimsuit with mesh details, a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and high-cut legs.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Track jacket with reflective details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, welt pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hair elastics.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Slim fit.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Satin-covered Alice band with faux fur ear appliqués.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and side pockets. Fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener, and straight wide legs.

Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with a foldover top edge and a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back of the heel. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft rubber soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif on the knees. Brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a wrapover front and high waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
